  %\VignetteIndexEntry{Basic SPSS labels support in R}
  %\VignetteEngine{knitr::rmarkdown}
  %\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
---

| Excel                 | R                                                          |
|-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------|
|`IF(A1>0, 1, 0)`       | ifelse(A>0, 1, 0)                                          |
|                       |                                                            |       
| E1 = COUNTIF(A1:D1, 0)| `modify(w, {                                               |
|                       |           E = count_row_if(0, A %to% D)                    |
|                       |           }) `                                             |
|                       |         or                                                 |
|                       |         count_row_if(0, A, B, C, D)                        |
|                       |                                                            |

```{r, eval = FALSE}

E1 = IF(A1>0, 1, 0)                 modify(w, { E = ifelse(A>0, 1, 0)})

```

```{r, eval = FALSE}

COUNTIF(A:D, 0)                     with(w, count_if(0, A %to% D)) or with(w, count_if(0, A, B, C, D)) 

```

```{r, eval = FALSE}

E1 = COUNTIF(A1:D1, 0)              modify(w, { 
                                              E = count_row_if(0, A %to% D)
                                              }) 
                                            or 
                                            count_row_if(0, A, B, C, D) 

```

```{r, eval = FALSE}

COUNTIF(A1:D1, ">0")                count_row_if(gt(0), A %to% D) or count_row_if(gt(0), A, B, C, D) 

```
